name: Re-order subtitle streams by language
author: Josh.5
description:
Specify a language tag for Unmanic to try and put as 1st subtitle track.

In the plugin settings, specify a 'Search String'. The plugin will search the files to find matching subtitle tracks. The matching subtitle tracks will be moved to the 1st subtitle track position.

Examples of search strings:
  - 'en'
  - 'fr'
  - 'de'
